ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: UDP sockets are best suited for
ENGLISH.OPT2: Real time voice or video streaming

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: What system call is used to establish a TCP connection on the client side?
UDP socket can use connect( ) system call to
ENGLISH.OPT1: set a default peer address for send/receive

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: In persistent http connection after accessing objects from server by client, when does connection closes?
ENGLISH.OPT1: A separate http request has to send to close the connection.
ENGLISH.OPT2: A timer is initiated at TCP level and once it expires, it closes connection.

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: Initial sender window size in TCP is 1 MSS then the sender window size after 3 RTTS in slow start algorithm is ________ MSS.
In which scenario does a client send a request to port 80 but the actual http server or the machine listens on port 7000.
ENGLISH.OPT1: When the http server is directly bound to port 80.
ENGLISH.OPT2: When a reverse proxy listens on port 80 and forwards requests to port 7000.
ENGLISH.OPT3: When the client mistakenly connects to port 80 instead of port 7000.
ENGLISH.OPT4: When the server redirects all traffic to port 80 regardless of configuration.

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: In a reverse proxy set up where a client connects to port 80 and the proxy forwards the request to a backend server on port 50000, how many serial TCP connections are typically established? ________.
How can IP address of a computer can be known?
ENGLISH.OPT1: By checking configuration files in |etc| hosts
ENGLISH.OPT2: By using IP config command in command prompt
ENGLISH.OPT3: By using arp command in command prompt

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: Storing the IP address of host name at local DNS server will help in
ENGLISH.OPT1: reducing the overall average DNS delay.
ENGLISH.OPT3: routers to process packets and forward fastly

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: Once the browser gets the IP address of the concerned host name from DNS then the next step is
ENGLISH.OPT1: http request for first object can be initiated.
ENGLISH.OPT2: can initiate a TCP connection to the http server.

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: Which of following is true in case of flow control policies of TCP and congestion policies of TCP?
ENGLISH.OPT1: It supports selective acks as per updated RFCS.
ENGLISH.OPT3: It can guarantee minimum communication rate.

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: Which module is responsible for attaching transport layer header and network layer header in TCP/IP model?
Which of following is true in case of sockets of TCP?
ENGLISH.OPT1: When server has accepted the one client connection, then same server cannot accept further connections from different clients.
ENGLISH.OPT2: When server has accepted one client connection, then same server can accept further connections from different clients.
ENGLISH.OPT3: Listen( ) and accept( ) are the system calls at the server side.
ENGLISH.OPT4: Listen( ) and accept( ) are the system calls at the client side.

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: Which module can analyze network layer header and validate it, when data is transmitted from source to destination?
ENGLISH.OPT2: The destination station’s Kernel at network layer.
ENGLISH.OPT3: Bridges at the data link layer.

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: Which of following is true in case of networking devices?
ENGLISH.OPT3: Hub is a two port device.

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: The total length field given in the IP protocol is 16 bits. If the total length field in IP header is given as 0000 0000 0000 0000 then it indicates.
Which of following is client to server protocol and when the message is transmitted, both are fixed ports?
Which of following is true in networking?
ENGLISH.OPT1: All the computers connected in same network should have same prefix.
ENGLISH.OPT2: More than one computer of a same network cannot be connected interface of router, in between bridge is required.

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: Which of following is true if server is connected to two clients at same time using TCP sockets?
ENGLISH.OPT1: Common TCP variables like SYN, ACK are provided to two connections.
ENGLISH.OPT2: Separate TCP variables like SYN, ACK are provided to two connections.
ENGLISH.OPT3: Still Listen( ) system call will be available for further new connections.

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: Which type of sockets are used when the application wants to use the functions of IP layer or to develop some tools like ping?

Consider that 10 machines need to be connected in a LAN using 8 port ethernet switches. Assume that these switches do not have any separate uplink ports.
The minimum number of switches needed are ________.

Parity scheme is implemented for error detecting in transmitting data. Even parity concept is used for adding parity to the data bits.
Then the hamming distance between the valid codewords is always
ENGLISH.OPT3: both odd and even numbers possible

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: In a communication network, a packet of length L bits takes link L1 with a probability of P1 or link L2 with a probability of P2. Link L1 and L2 have bit error probability of b1 and b2 respectively. The probability that the packet will be received without error via either L1 or L2 is
A UDP server has to be configured to connect to one client only then the API on machine should support.
Which one of following is/are  client server application?

For a host machine that uses the token bucket algorithm for the congestion control, the token bucket has a capacity of 1 Megabyte and the maximum output rate is the 20 Megabytes per second. Tokens arrive at a rate to sustain output at a rate of 15 Megabytes per second. The token bucket
is currently full and the machine needs to send 12 Megabytes of data.
The minimum time required to transmit the data is ________ seconds.

A link of capacity 200 Mbps is carrying traffic from a number of sources. Each source generates an on-off traffic stream, when the source is on, the rate of traffic is 10 Mbps, and when the source is off, the rate of traffic is zero. The duty cycle which is ratio of on time to off time is 1 : 2. When there is no buffer at the link, the minimum number of sources that can be multiplexed on the link. So that link capacity is not wasted and no data loss occurs is S1.
Assuming that all sources are synchronized and that the link is provided with a large buffer, the maximum number of sources that can be multiplexed so that no data loss occurs is S2. The values of S1 and S2 respectively.
Which of the following functions must be implimented by a network protocol over and above the data link protocol:

On a wireless link, the probability of frame error is 0.4. A stop and wait ARQ protocol is used to transfer data across the link. It is a memory less channel i.e., independents from transmission to transmission. What is the average number of transmission attempts required to transfer 96 packets?
Identify the correct order in which a server process must invoke the function calls sendto( ), recvto( ), socket( ), bind( ) according to UDP socket API.
The traffic generated by the device to the device in network is known as

Consider a simple communication system where multiple nodes are connected by a shared broadcast medium (like ethernet of wireless).
The nodes in the system use the following carrier sense based medium access protocol.
A node that receives a packet to transmit will carrier sense the medium for 5 units of time.
If the node does not detect any other transmission in this duration, it starts transmitting it’s packet in the next time unit.
If the node detects another transmission, it waits until this other transmission finishes and then begins to carrier sense for 5 time units again.
Once they start to transmit nodes does not perform any collision detection and continue transmission even it a collision occurs.
All transmissions last for 20 units of time. Assume that the transmission signal travels at speed of 10 meters per unit time in medium.
Assume that the system has two nodes P and Q located at d distance a meters from each other. P
starts transmitting a packet at time t = 0 and begins to carrier sense the medium.
The maximum distance d (in meters, rounded to closest integer) that allows Q to successfully
avoid a collision between its proposed transmitted and P’s ongoing transmissions is ________.

An upper layer packet is split into 8 frames each of which has 40% chance of arriving damaged.
Also assume that no error control is done at data link layer. How many times the message is sent on an average to get the entire message through?
